body:
Meeting notes from chat with @MattGrimes 

Ideas for making things safer: 

- template more studies. For example many heartbeat studies went out last year and having well defined functionality let people go faster because they were less worried about footguns
  - also reduces our need to use legacy/web extensions to do the same frequent things
- triple sign off for studies that affect more than > 1% of the population

Thinking about this at a higher level we should: 

- let people know how to make proposals for templated studies. A good start would be to encourage people to file an issue and label with "proposal" in this repo
- what seatbelts can be defined for different types of studies? ie: triple sign off, written proposals, muffin baskets to the study gods, etc. 
- etc.

Thinking about this at a higher level we should:

  • let people know how to make proposals for templated studies. A good start would be to encourage people to file an issue and label with "proposal" in this repo
